Accessibility Resources

Ok so check this stuff out - adding way more in soon

  • Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG 2.2)

    This is the standard setting body (w3c) and the official recommendation that gets adopted by various organizations.

  • Section 508

    Section 508 of the rehabilitation act is where we get federal conformance regulation from.
